page.title: 04WARE PARK AND MANOR HOUSE
page.content: When sold in 1919,the 1130 acre estate included{200 acres of parkland.}Within this area now, lies pleasant woodland, farmland,a{monastery}and a few houses. The{Victorian mansion}was used as a T.B. hospital until 1973 then an ambu- lance training school. In 1984 it was converted into 15{luxury flats.}Each has electric central heating, kitchen with split_level cooker, 1_3 bedrooms, lounge (largest 7x5m), 1_2 bathrooms, garage,security entry_phone and shared gardens. Prices start at Â£37500. The outbuildings are being replaced by{executive homes}which will cost at least Â£250000 due to their large plots and fine parkland setting. Ware Park seems to be a very{private place. There are many 'no-trespassing' signs nailed to trees and woodland is fenced off to allow new trees to grow for the benefit of future generations.
